item.title: Large pothole on Park Road adjacent to 47, 15th July
item.description:
Every time it rains hard a large lake appears spreading almost to the other side of the road and invariably will flood down my drive and spread detritus all over the front of the house. This was fixed perhaps a year and half ago and was functioning well with a little help from the house owner. It is now fully blocked and always floods. My previous household insurer refused to renew my policy due to flooding risk!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
